projects.title: FITNIS
projects.description: Actively developing a mobile fitness app to monitor usersâ€™ weightlifting progress and overall health

projects.title: Keypad System
projects.description: A Keypad system centered around the ARM Cortex M4-based STM32F407 Microcontroller with a servo motor used to control the locking mechanism. The actual keypad interface is implemented using React to allow accessibility on multiple devices. In order to interface between the two, a Flask API is used to both control access as well as keep logs of who accesses the system.

projects.title: Crypto Price Tracker
projects.description: A Full-stack crypto price tracking application built using React, Flask and data stored on a local postgres database ran using Docker. Data is automatically fetched from a flask REST api which can either gather data using coinmarketcap's api or scraping the coinmarketcap.com webpage.

projects.title: Proof-of-Purchase (POP) Code
projects.description: Point of sale system which included an environmentally friendly alternative to paper receipts. Receipt legitimacy is verified by comparing a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain against an SQL Database.
